data.title: 2000s R&B Singer Kelis FINALLY Steps Out After Husband's Death . . . Shows Her Stuff In Bathing Suit!
data.meta_description: 2022 has been a difficult year for 2000s R&B singer Kelis. Since Mike’s death, Kelis has been doing her best to hold everything together. Prior to his death, the […]
data.text:
2022 has been a difficult year for 2000s R&B singer Kelis. Mike Mora, husband of eight years to Kelis, passed away in March at the age of 37 following an 18-month battle with stage 4 stomach cancer.

Since Mike’s death, Kelis has been doing her best to hold everything together. Prior to his death, the couple had a beautiful life together. They had a family with three children and worked together on developing their farm.

Kelis’s children are Knight and Shepherd, and daughter Galilee.

She welcomed Knight in July 2009 with then-husband Nas. Unfortunately, the pair called it quits the following year, but continue to co-parent Knight today.

In December 2015, Kelis welcomed her second child, Shepherd, with her late husband, Mike Mora. They also welcomed a daughter named Galilee in September 2020.

Three years ago, she and Mike bought Bounty Farms in Quindio, Colombia, and moved out of the United States. Kelis’s love for cooking, eating healthy, and a simpler lifestyle inspired the move.

But working a farm is hard work – and without Mike, Kelis had to dedicate almost all her time to keeping her farm afloat.

Well it look like Kelis finally has some time to come up for air. Over the past few weeks, the beautiful R&B singer/farmer began posting a few vacation pics. She looks absolutely breathtaking.
